summary: An adventurers house is built in the forest not far from Ivarstead. The Key to the house is your\'s and it\'s located in the strongbox close to the house (check images for guidence.)
descriptionHtml:
[b]For video-trailer of this mod click here[/b]
[color=blue][b]---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/b][/color][color=blue][/color]
[url=http://youtu.be/XyE010KOAWg]Ivarstead Forest Home Trailer[/url]
[color=blue][b]---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/b][/color]

Ivarstead Forest Home Feautures:

[color=green]--[/color][color=red]-[/color] Location on map (fasttravel direct)
[color=green]--[/color][color=red]-[/color] Key is at strongbox close to the house (check Images for guidence)
[color=green]--[/color][color=red]-[/color] 3 rooms linked together with all the storage you need
[color=green]--[/color][color=red]-[/color] 6 display cases
[color=green]--[/color][color=red]-[/color] Both enchanting table and potion crafting table
[color=green]--[/color][color=red]-[/color] indoor flora and mushroom
[color=green]--[/color][color=red]-[/color] A little relaxing garden with tree and flora outside house
[color=green]--[/color][color=red]-[/color] Bird song around the house along with a fantastic view over throat of the world.
[color=green]--[/color][color=red]-[/color] Perfect mod for gamers that prefer a simple built home with all you need for storing 
[color=green]--[/color][color=red]-[/color] Left a lot of shelves and space empty for your character to fill out during the game

It\'s been heavy bug-tested but if you find something wrong in this mod you should write a comment! This mod will not interrupt other mods as long as they don\'t collide

[u]NO DLC IS REQUIRED FOR THIS MOD[/u]
author: Eldhee
